    • Method Detail

      • adminCommand

        public static void adminCommand(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                java.lang.String[] args,
                java.lang.String gameName,
                java.lang.String adminPerm,
                java.lang.String setPerm)
        A built in method for handling admin commands so that other minigames plugins do not need to code in the general commands. This only handles admin commands built into the API, additional commands must be handled externally in another plugin.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who sent the command.
        args - The command args.
        gameName - The name of the game.
        adminPerm - The permission to use any admin related commands.
        setPerm - The permission to use any set related commands.
